event.name: TRANSPORT_DESTROYED
event.text: You destroyed the transport, but nothing remains of its cargo. Dismayed, you scrap what remains of the hull and the few supplies that are floating around.

choice.text: (Scrap Arm) Use the arm to collect extra scrap.
(Drone Arm) Use the arm to collect extra drone parts.
(Magnet Arm) Use the magnet to draw in some extra supplies.

escape.text: They look like they don't want to fight. They are trying to escape.

event.name: TRANSPORT_CAPTURE_JERRY
event.text: The crew of the transport has been killed. You scrap the hull before moving on to inspect the contents.

event.text: The crew is dead, leaving you with the ship. Its cargo is yours for the taking. While digging around for weapons or drones however, you stumble across a ring resembling those on Ancient Cognitives...

The Cognitive awakens, its hologram forming. Though its voice is monotone, you sense a layer of sarcasm. "Oh, flesh puppets. I assume the corpses of my old masters implies I belong to you now. Hooray. This is sarcasm, if you could not tell."
